title: Automatic Question & Answer Generation Using Generative LLM
tldr: Fine-tuned Llama-2 with prompt engineering for MCQ/conceptual/factual QG using RACE dataset
application: Direct blueprint for quiz generation module — use their prompt templates and RACE eval methodology

title: Automatic MCQ Generation and Evaluation
tldr: PDF to glossary to question pipeline with LLM-based quality judging
application: Adopt their 3-stage pipeline (glossary extraction to preliminary QG to quality review) for quiz module

title: LLM-Guided Controllable Question Generation
tldr: Planning-first approach to QG with controllable dimensions (local vs summary explicit vs implicit)
application: Use their taxonomy of question types to generate diverse quiz questions not just factual recall

title: What Should I Learn First: LectureBank
tldr: 1352 lecture files + 208 prerequisite topic pairs for educational NLP
application: Use LectureBank prerequisite annotations to train/evaluate concept graph prerequisite detection

title: Deep Knowledge Tracing
tldr: LSTM-based model tracking student knowledge state over time from interaction sequences
application: Inspires weak-topic detection — sequential modeling of quiz responses to predict mastery

title: BKT-LSTM: Efficient Student Modeling
tldr: Hybrid BKT+LSTM combining interpretability of Bayesian KT with deep learning accuracy
application: Simplified scoring model takes the BKT probability framework and adds modern signals

title: iText2KG: Incremental Knowledge Graphs Using LLMs
tldr: Zero-shot KG construction with Document Distiller + entity/relation extraction + graph integration
application: Direct integration — use iText2KG 4-module pipeline for building concept graphs from lecture content

title: LLM-empowered Knowledge Graph Construction Survey
tldr: Comprehensive survey of LLM approaches to KG construction: extract define canonicalize
application: Validates LLM-based concept extraction approach; adopt the EDC framework

title: Comprehensive Taxonomy of Prompt Engineering
tldr: Taxonomy of prompt techniques: structure examples output format all matter for LLM quality
application: Guides prompt template design for QG summarization and concept extraction

title: FSRS: Free Spaced Repetition Scheduler
tldr: DSR-model based scheduling that outperforms SM-2 by 20-30% fewer reviews for same retention
application: Adopt FSRS difficulty/stability/retrievability model for review scheduling and weak-topic scoring
